alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:50AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN VENANGO...NORTHEASTERN BUTLER... NORTHEASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON...NORTHERN ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND SOUTHWESTERN FOREST COUNTIES... An area of snow showers quickly moving southeast could result in brief reductions during the morning commute and slick roadway conditions early this morning. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Brookville, Knox, Rimersburg, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, Sykesville, Falls Creek, and Seneca. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 31 and 96. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this intense snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango
